name: mri_concatenate_gcam
description: Concatenate a combination of input LTAs (linear transform array) and GCAMs (Gaussian classifier atlas, M3Z).

inputs.name: Input Transforms
inputs.description: Combination of input LTAs and M3Zs.

inputs.name: Output Transform
inputs.description: Concatenated output transform, saved as an LTA or M3Z depending on the input transforms.

inputs.name: Change Source Image
inputs.description: Change source image geometry of output M3Z, useful for GCAM inversion if the path of the original source volume changed.

inputs.name: Change Target Image
inputs.description: Change destination image geometry of output M3Z.

inputs.name: Reduce LTA
inputs.description: Reduce output LTA to single LT.

inputs.name: Downsample M3Z
inputs.description: Downsample output M3Z to spacing of 2; by default, the output spacing is that of the rightmost input M3Z.

output-files.description: Composite LTA or M3Z transform, depending on input.
output-files.name: Output Transform File

author: FreeSurfer Developers
